RTUCards.settings.config-actions.title: Setup which decks you want!
RTUCards.settings.config-actions.hint: Once set, cards stacks will be automatically created
Unchecked actions will be automatically disable for all of your decks. They won't appear it deck details. Use this to reduce the action pool for your decks.
RTUCards.settings.config-actions.additio: This deck uses a custom implementation for card display. Some of the following actions may have been directly removed inside the implementation and won't be managed here.
If unlocked, you can define which actions should be available. Do it only if you're sure that this stack declaration won't evolve anymore. Lock it again to restore default values.
RTUCards.settings.config-shortcuts.title: Configure your shortcuts
RTUCards.settings.config-shortcuts.hint: Choose where to display shortcuts of your hand and revealed cards
RTUCards.settings.gmName.label: GM name
RTUCards.settings.gmName.hint: Name displayed when GMs do actions on decks
RTUCards.settings.gmIcon.label: GM icon
RTUCards.settings.gmIcon.hint: Displayed when GMs do actions on decks
RTUCards.settings.smallDisplay.label: Smaller window
RTUCards.settings.smallDisplay.hint: The classic card stack sheet may take too much room if you use a laptop screen
RTUCards.settings.stackForPlayerHand.hin: Each player has card in hands. Those cards are hidden from other players.
RTUCards.settings.stackForPlayerRevealed: Each player can have some visible cards displayed in front on him
RTUCards.settings.everyHandsPeekOn.label: Peek on player's hand
RTUCards.settings.everyHandsPeekOn.hint: GM can peek on player's hand (They will be warned)
RTUCards.settings.everyHandsDiscardAll.h: Players can discard their whole hand in one go
RTUCards.settings.everyRevealedDiscardAl: Players can discard all cards they have revealed in front of them in one go
RTUCards.settings.sheet.headers.fromDeck: Available actions on deck display : (GM only)
RTUCards.settings.sheet.headers.fromHand: Available actions on user hand display :
RTUCards.settings.sheet.headers.fromReve: Available actions when handling revealed cards :
RTUCards.settings.sheet.headers.fromDisc: Available actions on discard pile display :
RTUCards.settings.sheet.labels.fromDeckP: Peek on deck content (Players will be warned)
RTUCards.settings.sheet.labels.fromDeckD: Deal cards which will be directly revealed
Put cards directly on discard pile
RTUCards.settings.sheet.labels.fromDeckR: Reset the deck and shuffle all the cards
Rotate the card to see it upside down
RTUCards.settings.sheet.labels.fromHandP: Play multiple cards in on go
RTUCards.settings.sheet.labels.fromHandR: Revealed a card (and put it in the revealed stack)
RTUCards.settings.sheet.labels.fromHandE: Exchange a card with another player
RTUCards.settings.sheet.labels.fromHandR: Rotate the card to see it upside down
RTUCards.settings.sheet.labels.fromRevea: Exchange a card with another player
Play multiple visible cards in on go
Put the card back to your hand
Rotate the card to see it upside down
RTUCards.settings.sheet.labels.fromDisca: GM can shuffle a card inside the deck
Rotate the card to see it upside down
GM can shuffle all discard cards inside deck
